O72Mt7APqGP-iuSak4oYVg.text: My pay day treat each month, everything we have tried is excellent.   Plus points - The portions are huge, so careful on the amount you order.  - Huge range of veggie treats for the missus - the seafood is super fresh  - delivery is really quick  - if you go in person the shop is clean and modern  Things to try that we love:  Spicy Hot Squid, Large  Spicy Hot Crispy Tofu with Fresh Chilli & Onion, Large  Spicy Hot Crispy Aubergine, Large  Vegetable Singaporean Rice Noodle

gQJbQ7JUpnPD3rCwPOkTwQ.text: Excellent Chinese takeaway in Newington. I have been to Hot Kungfu with friends many times, and I've never been disappointed.  The food is always prepared fresh and quite quickly. Prices are good and include rice, which I always thought was the norm but often is not the case in Edinburgh. Drink prices are also good value, so I can get an entire meal for 6-7. You can't really beat that.  Food tastes good, staff are friendly, and there is an efficient delivery service too, if you're not able to collect. Highly recommended.

iNZsdwsa-rHunuaglrZvrg.text: Popped in here to order a little bit of takeaway on a rainy Friday night. Contrary to the other reviews I have seen online, I actually found the service to be quite friendly. Though when I asked what the difference really is between the large dish and the small dish, I was just told the large dish is bigger than the small dish. The food itself was not bad, it didn't exactly blow me away. I went for the small chicken chow mien (no veg because I am weird like that), which is actually is quite big, so who knows what the large is like! The chicken was a little on the dry side but the noodles were pretty good.
